Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult.”  While there are liberal uses of dream sequences, there’s not much extra here.
